name: MNEMONIC
tag_list: photo-moderation, ai, mobile, smart-enterprise, crowdsoursing, microtasking-platform, future-of-labourforce
overview:
MNEMONIC is a disrupting crowdsourcing platform for real-time photo moderation. We leverage both artificial and human intelligence, thus our clients (UGC companies) get the fastest and cheapest content moderation with the accuracy of 99%.

UGC market is growing rapidly while companies have to hire staff to moderate in-house and develop&support costly software for that. With Mnemonic you integrate through secure API and get your photos moderated 24/7 with turnaround up to 15 min. Thus you’re able to speed up user convertion rate dramatically (social/dating/media) and save your AD budget, to avoid App Store rejects and lawsuits, to keep your users loving your app and grow them.

Working with MNEMONIC you collaborate with a group of geeks who are committed to develop artificial intelligence by enhancing big data analysis and to bring it to the public service.

We hire technologies and a crowd which is well-educated and paid to analyze and sort out data.

external_links.title: "Mnemonic uses crowdsourcing to moderate user generated content" by e27, Singapore
